law.catch_line: As to bonds of prior issues:...
law.text:
As to bonds of prior issues:
Every resolution, rule, regulation, form, order, and directive adopted by or relating to the former Maryland Port Authority or adopted by or relating to the State Roads Commission remains in effect until changed by the Department; and
Every reference in this Code, any other law, ordinance, resolution, rule, regulation, order, directive, legal action, contract, or any other document to the Maryland Port Authority or the State Roads Commission means the Department.
